3: Meanwhile, Lee hands a tiny patch to Lucia behind his back. Lucia pats the smuggler on his shoulder.
Tell me, why are you being hunted by the KCC?
Please, don't... don't kill me. I... I'm just an errand runner and messenger.
My boss, Zack... ran to the other side of the island. Said he needed to catch an airship or something...
That smuggler is headed to a mountain.
So you let him go on purpose, Commandant.
Stay alert. I think he's still hiding something.
